categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Harvus was a Moff of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. At some point after the Empire's seizure of the planet Begeren in 3678 BBY, a young Human named Lassicar executed his slave parents and exposed their terrorist cell to Harvus.
Harvus' only mention to date is in the 2011 BioWare massively-multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the entry for Guardsman Lassicar in the in-game Codex.
